settings.subtitle: Configure your server preferences and behavior

autoReply.cooldownHelp: Minimum time between auto replies in milliseconds

language.help: Default language for bot responses and dashboard interface
language.changeNote: Dashboard language will change after saving settings

timezone.label: Timezone
timezone.searchHelp: Type to search for your timezone

slashCommands.help: Allow users to use slash commands

preview.title: Preview
preview.help: Adjust settings then save. Future AI responses may honor language & local time.

messages.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all changes?
messages.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?

auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please login again.

errors.general: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.validationFailed: Validation failed. Please check your input.

overview.title: Server Overview
overview.subtitle: Dashboard overview and server statistics

charts.stackedBarDescription: Stacked bar compares enabled vs disabled for autos and commands.

overview.noCommandsHint: Command statistics will appear here once users start interacting with your bot
overview.topCommandsEmpty: No commands executed in the last 24 hours.

recentActivity.title: Recent Security Activity
recentActivity.noViolationsHint: Security violations will appear here when they occur

activityStream.noActivityMessage: No recent activity found. Commands will appear here as they are executed.

autosSection.loadingMessage: Fetching your server's auto response patterns and settings...
autosSection.empty: No auto responses match your search.

modal.matchTypeHelp: Choose how the pattern should match text

section.bottomNote: Some commands are always-on or require specific permissions to toggle.

explain_image.desc: Explain up to 3 images with optional prompt.

translate.desc: Translate text into the target language.

poll results.desc: Show results for a poll id.

remind.desc: Schedule a reminder DM or channel.

level.desc: Check your level or someone else's XP level.

xp.desc: Check XP or view server leaderboard.

rank.desc: Check your rank in the server.

role add.desc: Add a self-assignable role to yourself or another user.

role remove.desc: Remove a self-assignable role from yourself or another user.

role toggle.desc: Enable/disable a role command (requires Manage Roles).

automod info.desc: View detailed info for an automod rule.

automod toggle.desc: Enable/disable an automod rule (requires Manage Server).

moderation ban.desc: Ban a user and optionally delete up to 7 days of messages (requires Ban Members).

moderation unban.desc: Unban a user by ID (requires Ban Members).

moderation kick.desc: Kick a user from the server (requires Kick Members).

moderation mute.desc: Timeout a user for a duration, e.g., 10m, 2h, 1d (requires Moderate Members).

moderation unmute.desc: Remove timeout from a user (requires Moderate Members).

moderation slowmode.desc: Set slowmode on a text channel (requires Manage Channels).

audit recent.desc: View recent moderation actions (requires Manage Server).

autoreply.desc: Automatic replies based on configured patterns.

automod.desc: Automatic moderation for spam, caps, links, and profanity.

audit logs.desc: Track all moderation actions and server changes.

anti-raid.desc: Protection against raids and mass join attacks.

scheduler info.desc: View detailed info for a scheduled message.

scheduler enable.desc: Enable a scheduled message (requires Manage Server).

scheduler disable.desc: Disable a scheduled message (requires Manage Server).

scheduler run.desc: Manually trigger a scheduled message now (requires Manage Server).

ytstats.desc: Show YouTube watcher cache & quota stats.

ytdebug.desc: Show recent YouTube watcher debug events (requires Manage Server).

twitchstats.desc: Show Twitch watcher cache & API stats.

twitchdebug.desc: Debug Twitch integration and test notifications.

coc clan.desc: Get clan information by tag or configured clan.

coc war.desc: Get current war information for a clan.

coc attacks.desc: Show war attack history for a player.

coc top.desc: Show top players in various categories.

coc stats.desc: Get detailed clan or player statistics.

coc warlog.desc: Show war log history for a clan.

coc watch.desc: Manage war watching for clans (requires Manage Server).

coc config.desc: Configure COC integration settings (requires Manage Server).

valorant profile.desc: Get player profile with account info and current rank.

valorant matches.desc: Show recent match history with stats and results.

valorant mmr.desc: View detailed MMR and rank tracking with RR changes.

valorant stats.desc: Show average performance statistics from recent matches.

valorant config.desc: Configure Valorant player tracking and notifications (requires Manage Server).

valorant esports.desc: View upcoming Valorant esports matches and tournament schedules.

roblox user.desc: Get Roblox user profile and stats.

roblox groups.desc: List groups and ranks for a user.

roblox username_history.desc: Show recent usernames for a user.

roblox badges.desc: Show recent badges earned by a user.

personalization.title: Bot Personalization
personalization.subtitle: Customize your bot's appearance and behavior

fields.permissionsNote: Only bot nickname can be changed per server. Avatar, status, and activity changes are not supported by Discord.
fields.globalSettingNote: This setting affects all servers and can only be changed by bot administrators
fields.previewNote: This preview updates instantly with your unsaved changes.

overview.title: Moderation Overview
overview.desc: Toggle protection features and configure settings for your community. Stronger protection may require more configuration.

common.loadFailedGeneric: Failed to load moderation data, please refresh the page

modal.title: {{feature}} Settings
modal.loadingHelp: Fetching current settings for this feature
modal.savingHelp: Applying changes and updating server configuration

info.title: How It Works
info.description: Reaction roles allow users to self-assign roles by reacting to messages. Users can react to the configured emojis to add or remove the associated roles.

types.title: Reaction Types:
types.toggle: Toggle - Users can add or remove the role by reacting
types.addOnly: Add Only - Users can only add the role, removing the reaction doesn't remove the role
types.removeOnly: Remove Only - Users can only remove the role by reacting

form.title: Title
form.titlePlaceholder: Enter a title for this reaction role
form.titleHelp: A descriptive title to help identify this reaction role
form.messageIdReadOnly: Message ID is read-only when editing
form.messageIdTooltip: Message ID cannot be changed when editing

customMessageHelp.editing: The message content for this reaction role
customMessageHelp.creating: The message content that will be posted by the bot

delete.title: Delete Reaction Role Message
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the reaction role message "{{title}}"?
delete.warning: This will remove all associated reactions and cannot be undone.

toasts.deleteFailed: Failed to delete reaction role message
toasts.statusFailed: Failed to update reaction role status

slash.subtitle: Configure custom slash commands for role management

info.title: How It Works
info.description: Users can use these custom slash commands to manage their roles. Each command can be configured with specific roles and behavior.

types.title: Command Types:
types.toggle: Toggle - Users can add or remove the role
types.add: Add Only - Users can only add the role
types.remove: Remove Only - Users can only remove the role

delete.title: Delete Slash Command
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the slash command "{{name}}"?
delete.warning: This will permanently remove the command and all its configurations. Users will no longer be able to use this command.

toasts.fetchFailed: Failed to fetch slash command roles

info.pre: Global spam, link, and malicious URL detection integrates with third-party reputation sources like

globalLog.label: Global Log Channel
globalLog.desc: Default channel to send AutoMod logs when a rule doesn't specify a channel

rules.subheader: Create rules to detect spam, caps, links, profanity, and more.
rules.emptyCta: Click Add Rule to create your first rule.

form.name: Rule Name
form.thresholdHelp: Number of violations before action is taken (Warn to user)
form.durationHelp: Duration for mute/ban actions (leave empty for permanent)
form.messageActionHelp: Action to take on violating messages
form.whitelistChannelsHelp: Channels where this rule won't apply
form.whitelistRolesHelp: Roles that bypass this specific rule

spam.label: Spam Detection
spam.description: Detect repeated messages and spam patterns

caps.label: Excessive Caps
caps.description: Filter messages with too many capital letters

links.label: Link Filter
links.description: Scan and block malicious links and URLs

invite_links.label: Invite Links
invite_links.description: Scan and block malicious Discord invite links

warn.label: Warn User
warn.description: Send a warning to the user

mute.label: Temporary Mute
mute.description: Mute the user for a specified duration

kick.label: Kick User
kick.description: Remove the user from the server

profanity.manageTip: Manage your profanity words and patterns in the "Profanity Management" section above to customize what content gets filtered.
profanity.subheader: Define words and regex patterns to detect inappropriate language.

words.emptyCta: Click Add Word to create your first entry.

delete.title: Confirm Word Deletion
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this profanity word?

patterns.emptyCta: Click Add Pattern to create your first entry.

delete.title: Confirm Pattern Deletion
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this profanity pattern?

deleteRule.title: Confirm Deletion
deleteRule.message: Are you sure you want to delete the automod rule?

toasts.ruleCreateFailed: Failed to create automod rule "{{name}}". Please try again.
toasts.ruleUpdateFailed: Failed to update automod rule "{{name}}". Please try again.
toasts.ruleDeleteFailed: Failed to delete automod rule "{{name}}". Please try again.
toasts.ruleToggleFailed: Failed to {{action}} automod rule "{{name}}". Please try again.
toasts.wordToggleFailed: Failed to toggle profanity word status. {{error}}
toasts.patternToggleFailed: Failed to toggle profanity pattern status. {{error}}

info.description: Track message edits/deletions, member updates, channel and role changes, and server events. Configure a global channel or separate channels per category.

globalChannel.label: Global Log Channel (Optional)
globalChannel.desc: Set all empty channels to this channel
globalChannel.placeholder: Set all empty channels to this

includeBots.label: Include Bot Actions
includeBots.desc: Log actions performed by bots and integrations

enhancedDetails.label: Enhanced Details
enhancedDetails.desc: Include additional context and metadata in logs

message.label: Message Logs
message.desc: Log message edits, deletions, and bulk deletions

member.label: Member Logs
member.desc: Log member joins, leaves, kicks, and bans

channel.label: Channel Logs
channel.desc: Log channel creation, deletion, and modifications

role.label: Role Logs
role.desc: Log role creation, deletion, and permission changes

server.label: Server Logs
server.desc: Log server settings changes and emoji updates

voice.label: Voice Logs
voice.desc: Log voice channel joins, leaves, and moves

toasts.saveFailed: Failed to save audit logging settings
toasts.copiedToEmpty: Copied global channel to empty categories
toasts.validationRequired: Please select at least one log channel or set a global channel

info.description: Detect and block raid attempts with join-rate limits, account-age checks, automated responses, and content safeguards.

items.trackPatterns: Track sudden spikes and suspicious join patterns
items.detectAttacks: Detect coordinated raid attempts in real-time

items.patterns: Detect bot-like naming and activity patterns

items.inviteSpam: Reduce invite spam from new accounts

warning.title: Note:
warning.message: Anti-raid actions can be strict. Tune thresholds to avoid impacting legitimate members during busy periods.

joinRate.label: Join Rate
joinRate.desc: Max joins allowed within the time window

accountAge.label: Minimum Account Age (days)
accountAge.desc: Block accounts newer than this age

raidAction.label: On Raid Detected
raidAction.desc: Primary action to take when a raid is detected

alertChannel.label: Alert Channel
alertChannel.desc: Where to send anti-raid alerts and summaries

autoKick.label: Auto-kick Suspicious
autoKick.desc: Automatically kick accounts that fail checks

gracePeriod.label: Grace Period (minutes)
gracePeriod.desc: Time to keep elevated protections enabled after detection

whitelistRoles.label: Bypass Roles
whitelistRoles.desc: Members with these roles bypass anti-raid checks

info.description: Set up automated messages to be sent at specific times or intervals. Perfect for announcements, reminders, and recurring posts.

list.title: Scheduled Messages ({{count}})
list.emptyCta: Click "Add Message" to create your first scheduled message

delete.title: Confirm Deletion
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the scheduled message "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

weekly.help: Pick any date; only weekday + time stored as D|HH:MM (0=Sun).

monthly.help: Pick any month; stored as DD|HH:MM.

toasts.validationRequired: Please fill in all required fields

welcome.info: Configure welcome messages for new members. Use placeholders like {user} and {server}. Set a channel and optionally send a DM and auto-assign a role.

defaults.dmMessage: Welcome to {server}! Thanks for joining us.

channel.label: Welcome Channel
channel.desc: Select the channel to send welcome messages

card.label: Include Welcome Card
card.desc: Attach a simple image card with the message

role.label: Auto-Assign Role
role.desc: Optionally assign a role to new members

dm.label: Send a DM
dm.desc: Also send a private welcome message to the user

dmMessage.label: DM Message
dmMessage.desc: Sent as a private message when enabled

info.description: Reward member activity with experience points and level progression. Configure XP rates, cooldowns, multiplier roles for special members, and excluded channels where XP won't be gained.

cooldownSeconds.label: XP Cooldown (seconds)
cooldownSeconds.desc: Time users must wait between XP gains

levelUpChannel.label: Level Up Channel
levelUpChannel.desc: Where to send level up messages (leave empty for same channel)

excludedChannels.label: Excluded Channels
excludedChannels.desc: Channels where users won't gain XP

levelUpMessages.label: Level Up Messages
levelUpMessages.desc: Send a message when users level up

multipliers.label: XP Multiplier Roles
multipliers.desc: Roles that get bonus XP multipliers
multipliers.note: Members with multiple multiplier roles will get the highest multiplier.

toasts.invalidMultiplier: Please select a role and enter a valid multiplier

welcome.label: Welcome Messages
welcome.desc: Greet new members with customizable welcome messages and cards.

automod.label: Auto Moderation
automod.desc: Automatically detect and handle spam, excessive caps, and inappropriate content.

roles.label: Role Management
roles.desc: Manage roles with reaction roles and role menus.

xp.label: XP & Leveling
xp.desc: Reward active members with XP points and level progression.

scheduler.label: Scheduled Messages
scheduler.desc: Schedule announcements and recurring messages for your server.

logging.label: Audit Logging
logging.desc: Track all moderation actions and server changes.

antiraid.label: Anti-Raid Protection
antiraid.desc: Protect your server from raids and mass join attacks.

valorant.intervalHint: How often to check for match updates (in seconds). Minimum 300 seconds (5 minutes).

tracking.minKillsHint: Only announce matches with at least this many kills

announce.globalMentionsHelp: These roles/users will be mentioned in all Valorant announcements

players.riotIdHelp: Enter Riot ID in format: Name#TAG (e.g., Player#NA1)
players.noPlayers: No players added yet. Add players to start tracking their matches.
players.customMessagePlaceholder: Optional custom message for this player's announcements
players.customMessageHelp: Leave empty to use the default template

toasts.invalidRiotId: Invalid Riot ID format. Please use Name#TAG format.
toasts.addFailed: Failed to add player. Please check the Riot ID and try again.

common.mentionHelper: Press Enter to add • Backspace to delete • Order is preserved
common.needSooner: If you need this sooner, let us know.

fields.clanNameHint: Enter your clan name (e.g., Elite Warriors)
fields.cwlAnnouncementsHelp: Channel for Clan War League announcements
fields.cwlLeaderboardHelp: Channel for CWL leaderboard and statistics

announce.globalMentionsHelp: These roles/users will be mentioned for all Clash of Clans notifications (wars, members, donations)

clans.memberAnnouncementChannelHelp: Channel for member join/leave announcements for this specific clan
clans.warMentionsHelp: Roles/users to mention for war events from this clan
clans.memberMentionsHelp: Roles/users to mention for member events from this clan
clans.donationMentionsHelp: Roles/users to mention for donation events from this clan

tracking.donationThresholdHint: Minimum donations per week to trigger announcements

leaderboard.channelHint: Channel where leaderboard images will be posted. Uses donation channel if not set.
leaderboard.scheduleHint: How often to automatically refresh the leaderboard. The leaderboard will also be posted immediately when you save this configuration.
leaderboard.timeHint: Time of day to post the leaderboard (24-hour format). Leave blank for any time.
leaderboard.templateHint: Message to accompany the leaderboard image. Leave blank for default message.
leaderboard.interactiveControlsHint: Add Refresh, Edit Board, and pagination buttons to the leaderboard message

warStats.enableWarStatsHint: Automatically post war statistics during active wars
warStats.channelHint: Channel where war statistics will be posted. Auto-refreshes during wars every 5 minutes.

templates.warStartPlaceholder: 🛡️ War started against {warOpponent}! Preparation ends {warEndTime}. Good luck {roleMention}!
templates.warEndPlaceholder: ⚔️ War against {warOpponent} ended! Result: {warResult} - {warStars} stars with {warDestructionPercentage}% destruction. Great job {roleMention}!
templates.memberJoinPlaceholder: 👋 Updated member {clanName}! We now have {memberCount} members!!
templates.donationPlaceholder: 💎 Weekly donations summary for {clanName}: Top contributors this week! {roleMention}

clashofclans.intervalHint: How often to check for clan updates (minimum 5 minutes, recommended 1 hour)

genshin.noPlayers: No players configured. Add a player to start tracking.

placeholders.customMessage: Custom announcement message for this player...
placeholders.profileUpdateTemplate: 🎮 {playerName} updated their profile! Adventure Rank: {adventureRank} | World Level: {worldLevel}
placeholders.spiralAbyssTemplate: 🌀 {playerName} made progress in Spiral Abyss! Floor {floor}, Chamber {chamber}

help.interval: How often to check for updates (minimum 300 seconds)
help.addPlayer: Enter a valid 9-digit Genshin Impact UID
help.customMessage: Optional custom message for announcements from this player
help.mentionTargets: Roles and users to mention in Genshin Impact announcements
help.minAchievementThreshold: Only announce achievements worth this many points or more

errors.invalidUID: Invalid UID. Please enter a valid 9-digit UID.
errors.playerNotFound: Player not found. Check that the UID is correct and profile is public.

announce.globalMentionsHelp: These roles/users will be mentioned for all Genshin Impact notifications

players.profileAnnouncementChannelHelp: Channel for profile update announcements for this specific player
players.buildAnnouncementChannelHelp: Channel for build update announcements for this specific player

players.buildMentionsHelp: Roles/users to mention for build updates from this player

welcome.title: Welcome System
welcome.subtitle: Configure welcome messages and new member settings

hero.title: Choco Maid
hero.description: Elevate your Discord server with an intelligent AI assistant that combines advanced automation, comprehensive moderation, and seamless gaming integrations—all in one powerful bot.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage and enhance your Discord server

ai.title: AI-Powered Intelligence
ai.description: Advanced conversations powered by Google Gemini 2.0 Flash with context retention, multi-image analysis, and intelligent content processing.

moderation.title: Advanced Moderation
moderation.description: Comprehensive moderation suite with spam detection, content filtering, anti-raid protection, and real-time threat detection with VirusTotal integration.

gaming.title: Gaming Integration
gaming.description: First-class support for Clash of Clans, YouTube, Twitch, Valorant, and Genshin Impact with automated announcements and leaderboards.

automation.title: Server Automation
automation.description: Automate your server with scheduled messages, welcome systems, auto-roles, XP leveling, and customizable auto-responses.

dashboard.title: Analytics Dashboard
dashboard.description: Beautiful, modern dashboard with real-time statistics, activity monitoring, and comprehensive server management tools.

i18n.title: Multi-Language Support
i18n.description: Full internationalization with 7 languages supported. Seamlessly switch between English, Indonesian, Spanish, French, German, Japanese, and Chinese.

ai.title: AI & Intelligence
ai.ask: Ask Gemini AI anything with context caching
ai.explainImage: Analyze up to 3 images with AI

leveling.title: Leveling & Engagement
leveling.xpCheck: Check user XP and level progress

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Discord Server?
cta.description: Join thousands of servers using Choco Maid to automate, moderate, and engage their communities.

footer.brandDescription: Your intelligent Discord companion for automation, moderation, and community engagement.
